item.title: It’s Morally Righteous, Not Bigotry To Notice All Cultures Are Not Equally Good
item.description: Multiculturalism has created a rigid standard of moral relativism that insists every culture is equal, no matter how it may violate the most basic pri...

item.title: ‘Birthright Citizenship’ Is A Feudal Relic That Has No Place In America
item.description: We used to base citizenship on consent, not birth. In an era of mass immigration, it’s time to get back to that older understanding.

item.title: Returning To ‘Times New Roman,’ The State Department Learns From Cracker Barrel’s Mistakes
item.description: It would be foolish to assume the aesthetics we surround ourselves with have no effect on how we perceive the world.

item.title: Leftist Wisconsin AG Is Failing To Fix The Problem He Pounded His Opponent On
item.description: Attorney General Josh Kaul won his first term on a manufactured rape kit-testing backlog scandal. Now he has the same problem and more.

item.title: A DOJ That Still Chases ‘Russian Hackers’ Will Never Reckon With Russiagate
item.description: The DOJ is prosecuting the fruits of a hoax on one hand and claiming to expose the architects of that hoax on the other.
